company_context: Bazaarvoice | The UGC Platform for Authentic Shopper Experiences Turn authentic customer content into measurable revenue. The only platform that collects, syndicates, and optimizes UGC across retailers — all in one place. See it in action Trusted by 13,000+ global brands and retailers to power ratings, reviews, and retail syndication. Read their stories Real brands. Real retailers. Real revenue impact. See how leading brands increase conversion, expand retail syndication, and turn customer content into measurable revenue. 1B+ authentic reviews, photos, and videos 18B+ shopper touchpoints enabled 3.1B+ peak monthly shoppers 21M+ network of creators and influencers When the right customer meets the right product, everyone wins. Dole The fresh fruit and packaged foods producer uses reviews to showcase new products, improve existing ones, and increase engagement with recipes on its website. 2.3K With an average rating of 4.7 stars. We are very pleased with the efficiency of using ReviewSource. The program was straightforward and grew our review count by the thousands. Molly Garris Senior Manager of E-commerce Marketing at Dole Read the success story Molton Brown The Molton Brown team sees a 54% lift in revenue per visitor and a 43% lift in conversion rate when customers engage with reviews. 54% per visitor when customers engage with reviews “Reviews are not just feedback; they're a vital tool that brings the in-store sensory experience online, helping customers make confident purchases.” Alice Clarke Global Digital Analyst at Molton Brown Read the success story Gladiator Gathering reviews from a select group of consumers helps Gladiator brand quickly drive more volume on retail partner sites. 93% Among customers who received a sample, 93% followed through with submitting a review It’s critical that we have reviews. In many cases, a shopper’s first experience is in reading reviews, so we needed a way to easily syndicate reviews to our partners’ sites. Michelle Wodarczyk Brand Marketing, Gladiator Read the success story Burt’s Bees Burt’s Bees leverages consumer content to drive retail channel sales, gather insights, and launch new products with immediate success. 94% Within just two weeks, 94% of those who received a sample submitted a review, resulting in more than 300 reviews We have a partner in Bazaarvoice that we’ll continue to turn to as we start selling even more products our customers will love. Taylor Steele Assistant E-commerce Manager, Burt’s Bees Read the success story Hobbycraft The retailer incorporated UGC into their content strategy and increased conversion, time on site, and average order value 219% UGC is more authentic to our customers and complements our traditional brand product imagery Lauren Couston Digital Product Content Manager, Hobbycraft Read the success story Land O’Lakes The food brand uses the voice of the customer to gather insights, increase retail sales, and improve customer engagement. 30,000 Land O'Lakes has syndica

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours optimize their customer content and turn it into measurable revenue. I came across Bazaarvoice and was impressed with the work you're doing in the UGC space. Can you tell me a bit about your current data processing workflow?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yeah. We're actually pretty set with our current solution. We've been working with a competitor of yours, and they've been doing a good job for us so far. What makes DeepData AI different from what we're already using?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question. Our AI-powered engine allows for more efficient data processing, which translates to faster insights and better decision-making for your team. We've seen our clients experience up to 30% increase in revenue after implementing our solution. I'd love to discuss how we can help Bazaarvoice specifically.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I'm not sure if we're in the market for a new solution right now. We just renewed our contract with our current provider, and we're locked in for the next two years. Plus, I'm not convinced that the cost savings would be worth the hassle of switching. Your solution sounds interesting, but can you tell me more about the pricing?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Absolutely. Our pricing is competitive, and we offer customized plans based on the specific needs of our clients. I can offer you a discount for a multi-year commitment, which would bring the cost down significantly. However, I understand that timing is everything, and I'm happy to discuss potential ROI and how we can help you achieve your goals.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but like I said, we're locked into a contract. Even if I wanted to switch, I'm not sure I have the authority to make that decision without going through a lengthy approval process. And to be honest, I'm concerned about the integration process with our existing systems. We've had issues with that in the past, and I don't want to risk disrupting our workflow.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I completely understand your concerns, and I appreciate your honesty. I can offer you a trial or a pilot program to test our solution and see the benefits for yourself. We've had great success with other companies in similar situations, and I'm confident we can make it work for Bazaarvoice as well.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alex, I appreciate the pitch, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. As I mentioned, we're locked into a contract, and I just don't see the upside in switching at this point. I appreciate your understanding, and I wish you the best of luck with your sales efforts.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have more thoroughly assessed the buyer's contract situation and potential for change before diving into the pitch to avoid wasting time and effort. Sentiment: Neutral

parsed.feedback: The seller should have more thoroughly assessed the buyer's contract situation and potential for change before diving into the pitch to avoid wasting time and effort. Sentiment: Neutral
